tuv.seg: Making a complaint about a health service
Gearán a dhéanamh faoi sheirbhís sláinte
This document describes the complaints system for public health services provided by, or on behalf of, the Health Service Executive (HSE)
Déantar cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar an gcóras gearán le haghaidh seirbhísí sláinte poiblí a sholáthraíonn Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) nó a sholáthraítear thar a ceann
For information about making a complaint about a private health service visit healthcomplaints.ie which provides information on making complaints about private and public health services
I dtaobh seirbhísí sláinte príobháideacha, tabhairt cuairt ar healthcomplaints.ie, a sholáthraíonn faisnéis ar ghearáin a dhéanamh faoi sheirbhísí sláinte príobháideacha agus poiblí
There is a statutory complaints system for anyone seeking or receiving public health or personal social services who wishes to make a complaint about the HSE

Tá córas reachtúil gearán ar fáil d’aon duine atá ar lorg nó ag fáil seirbhísí sláinte poiblí nó seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta agus ar mian leis/léi gearán a dhéanamh faoi Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte
The complaints system also covers service providers with HSE contracts who provide health or personal social services on behalf of the HSE
Clúdaítear i gcóras na ngearán na soláthraithe seirbhíse a bhfuil conarthaí acu le FSS agus a chuireann seirbhísí sláinte nó sóisialta pearsanta ar fáil thar ceann FSS
The law governing the complaints system is set out in Part 9 of the Health Act 2004
Tá an dlí lena rialaítear córas na ngearán leagtha amach i Cuid 9 Acht Sláinte 2004
What can you make a complaint about?
Cad faoi is féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh?

You may make a complaint about any action of the HSE or a service provider that, in your view, doesn’t seem to be fair or reliable administrative practice and that adversely affects you, or someone on whose behalf you are making a complaint
Is féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh faoi ghníomh ar bith de chuid FSS nó soláthraithe seirbhíse maidir leis an méid seo a leanas:
Administrative practice refers to the way decisions are made and how services operate
Cad is cleachtas riaracháin cothrom nó iontaofa ann?
Under the complaints system, administrative practice isn’t considered to be fair or reliable if it is:
Ní mheastar cleachtas riaracháin a bheith cothrom ná iontaofa de réir chóras na ngearán sna cásanna seo a leanas:
• Taken without proper authority
• Déantar é gan údarás cuí
• Taken on irrelevant grounds
• Déantar é de bhun bunús neamhábhartha
• The result of negligence or carelessness
• Déantar é de thoradh faillí nó míchúraim
• Based on erroneous or incomplete information
• Déantar é bunaithe ar fhaisnéis atá mícheart nó neamhiomlán
• Based on undesirable administrative practice
• Déantar é bunaithe ar chleachtas riaracháin atá neamh-inmhianaithe, nó
• In any other respect, against fair or sound administration
• Ar ábhar ar bith eile, atá contráilte do riarachán cothrom ná iontaofa
Who can make a complaint?
Cé atá in ann gearán a dhéanamh?
If you are unable to make a complaint on your own behalf due to your age, illness or disability, someone else can make a complaint on your behalf
Mura bhfuil tú in ann gearán a dhéanamh ar do shon féin de dheasca aoise, tinnis nó míchumais, is féidir le duine eile gearán a dhéanamh ar do shon
• Anyone appointed by law or the courts to take care of your affairs
• Duine ar bith atá ceaptha de réir an dlí nó de réir na gcúirteanna chun do chuid gnóthaí a riar
(This would seem to include a Committee of a Ward of Court or someone appointed under an Enduring Power of Attorney
(San áireamh leis seo bheadh Coiste Coimircí Cúirte nó duine atá ceaptha faoi Chumhacht Bhuan Aturnae
It is not however entirely clear as the law which applies to Committees and Attorneys gives them specific and not general powers)
Níl sé iomlán soiléir áfach ós rud é go dtugtar cumhachtaí sainiúla, seachas cumhachtaí ginearálta dóibh sa dlí a bhaineann le Coistí agus le hAturnaetha)
• Anyone else with your consent
• Duine ar bith eile atá ceadaithe agat, nó
• Anyone who is appointed, as set out in the Regulations
• Duine ar bith eile atá ceaptha, de réir mar atá leagtha amach sna Rialacháin
Can a complaint be made on behalf of a deceased person?
An féidir gearán a dhéanamh thar ceann duine nach maireann?
In such cases the complaint may be made by a close relative or carer
I gcásanna dá leithéid is féidir le garghaol nó le cúramóir an gearán a dhéanamh
A close relative includes a parent, guardian, son, daughter, spouse or cohabiting partner
Is ionann garghaol is tuismitheoir, caomhnóir, mac, iníon, céile nó páirtí comhchónaithe
Remember, the complaint must be made within 12 months of the date of the action giving rise to the complaint or of the person becoming aware of the action
Ní mór don ghearán a bheith déanta, áfach, laistigh de 12 mhí ó dháta an ghnímh atá mar ábhar an ghearáin nó ón dáta a thagann an gníomh chun feasa an duine atá i gceist
A complaints officer may extend the time limit if there are special circumstances involved
D’fhéadfadh oifigeach gearán an teorainn ama a shíneadh má tá imthosca speisialta i gceist
Which complaints are not covered?
Cad iad na gearáin nach bhfuil clúdaithe?
You cannot complain about:
Ní féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh faoin méid seo a leanas:
• A matter that is, or has been the subject of legal proceedings before a court or tribunal
• Ábhar atá, nó a bhí mar ábhar imeachtaí dlíthiúla os comhair cúirte nó binse
• A matter relating solely to the clinical judgment (medical decision) by a person acting on behalf of the HSE or a service provider
• Gníomh arna ghlacadh ag FSS nó ag soláthraí seirbhíse de bhun comhairle duine éigin a d’úsáid a bhreithiúnas cliniciúil
• An action taken by the HSE or a service provider solely on the advice of someone exercising their clinical judgment
• Ábhar maidir le hearcú, ceapachán nó téarmaí agus coinníollacha fostaithe nó comhairleoirí FSS nó soláthraí seirbhíse
• A matter relating to the recruitment, appointment or terms and conditions of an employee or advisor of the HSE or a service provider
• Ábhar a bhaineann le hAchtanna Leasa Shóisialaigh, mar shampla An Scéim Liúntais Leasa Fhorlíontaigh. (Téitear i ngleic leo trí Oifig Achomhairc Leasa Shóisialaigh)
• A matter relating to the registration of births, marriages and deaths that could be the subject of an appeal (Section 60 of the Civil Registration Act 2004)
• Ábhar a bhaineann le clárú breitheanna, bainiseacha agus básanna a d’fhéadfadh a bheith mar ábhar achomhairc (Alt 60 den Acht um Chlárú Sibhialta)
A matter that could prejudice an investigation being undertaken by the Gardaí
• Ábhar a d’fhéadfadh dochar a dhéanamh d’fhiosrúchán atá á dhéanamh ag na Gardaí
• A matter that has been brought before any other statutory complaints procedure
• Ábhar atá curtha faoi bhráid nós imeachta reachtúil eile um ghearáin
(This doesn’t prevent a complaints officer dealing with a complaint that was made to the Ombudsman or the Ombudsman for Children.)
(Ní chuireann sé seo bac ar oifigeach gearán dul i ngleic le gearán atá curtha faoi bhráid an Ombudsman nó an Ombudsman do Leanaí)
How does the HSE complaints procedure operate?
Conas mar a oibríonn nós imeachta gearán FSS?
The complaints officer will be informed of all verbal complaints that could not be resolved at the first point of contact and will receive a copy of all written complaints
Tabharfar fógra don oifigeach gearán faoi gach gearán ó bhéal nach rabhthas in ann a réiteach ag an gcéad phointe teagmhála. Gheobhaidh an t-oifigeach gearán cóip de gach gearán scríofa freisin
Depending on the nature of the complaint, the complaints officer, with the consent of the people involved, may consider if an informal resolution might be appropriate
Ag brath ar chineál an ghearáin, féadfaidh an t-oifigeach gearán, le toiliú na ndaoine lena mbaineann, breithniú a dhéanamh ar cé acu atá nó nach bhfuil réiteach neamhfhoirmiúil oiriúnach don chás
As part of the informal resolution the complaints officer may arrange a meeting between the parties concerned or use mediation services
Mar chuid den réiteach neamhfhoirmiúil, féadfaidh an t-oifigeach gearán cruinniú a eagrú idir na páirtithe lena mbaineann nó leas a bhaint as seirbhísí idirghabhála
If informal resolution is not appropriate or turns out not to be successful, the complaints officer will start a formal investigation of the complaint
Mura bhfuil réiteach neamhfhoirmiúil oiriúnach don chás, nó mura n-éiríonn le réiteach neamhfhoirmiúil, tionscnóidh an t-oifigeach gearán imscrúdú foirmiúil ar an ngearán
You may then ask for a review of that recommendation and there will be an internal review
Ansin is féidir leat athbhreithniú ar an moladh sin a lorg agus déanfar athbhreithniú inmheánach
(See ‘How to apply’ for information on how to make a complaint)
(Féach ar ‘Conas iarratas a dhéanamh’ thíos le fáil amach conas gearán a dhéanamh)
Written complaints will be acknowledged within five working days and the complaint will be investigated within 30 working days
Tabharfar admháil maidir le gach gearán scríofa laistigh de chúig lá oibre agus déanfar an gearán a fhiosrú laistigh de 30 lá oibre
You will get a written response to your complaint
Gheobhaidh tú freagra scríofa maidir le do ghearán
You will be told of your right to have an internal review and of your right to go to the Ombudsman
Cuirfear ar an eolas tú maidir le do cheart athbhreithniú inmheánach a fháil agus maidir le do cheart dul i muinín an Ombudsman
Service providers may put their own procedures in place by agreement with the HSE
Is féidir le soláthraithe seirbhíse a nósanna imeachta féin a chur i bhfeidhm trí chomhaontú le FSS
It is a condition of the agreement between the HSE and service providers that service providers will comply with the HSE complaints procedure, or establish its own complaints procedures
Is coinníoll é sa chomhaontú idir FSS agus soláthraithe seirbhíse go gcomhlíonfaidh soláthraithe seirbhíse nós imeachta gearán FSS, nó go ndéanfaidh siad a nósanna imeachta gearán féin a bhunú

It’s also a condition that the service provider will co-operate with the HSE in any review of a complaints officer’s recommendation following the investigation of a complaint against the service provider

Is coinníoll é fosta go gcomhoibreoidh an soláthraí seirbhíse le FSS maidir le hathbhreithniú ar bith ar mholadh an oifigigh ghearán i ndiaidh an fhiosrúcháin ar ghearán i gcoinne an tsoláthraí seirbhíse
Are complaints officers required to fully investigate every complaint?
An gá d’oifigigh gearán fiosrúchán iomlán a dhéanamh ar gach gearán?
Complaints officers may stop investigating a complaint for various reasons
Is féidir le hoifigigh gearán stop a chur le fiosrúchán ar ghearán ar chúiseanna éagsúla
For example, if the complaint is trivial or vexatious
Mar shampla, más neafaiseach nó cráiteach an gearán
Complaints officers do not have to investigate complaints that don’t come within the scheme
Ní gá d’oifigigh gearán fiosrúchán a dhéanamh ar ghearáin nach gclúdaítear mar chuid den scéim
What recommendations can a complaints officer not make?
Cad iad na moltaí is féidir le hoifigeach gearán a dhéanamh?
A complaints officer cannot make a recommendation which would require the HSE to make a material change to its approved service plan
Ní féidir le hoifigeach gearán moladh a dhéanamh a chuirfeadh iallach ar FSS athrú ábhartha a chur lena plean seirbhíse atá faofa
(Approved service plans indicate the type and volume of health and personal social services to be provided by the HSE, they indicate planned capital spending on services, etc.)

(Léiríonn pleananna seirbhíse faofa cineál agus méid na seirbhísí sóisialta sláinte agus pearsanta atá le soláthar ag FSS, léiríonn siad an caiteachas caipitil atá beartaithe le haghaidh seirbhísí, srl)
Complaints officers cannot make recommendations either that would require a change to be made to the contractual arrangements which the HSE has with a service provider
Ní féidir le hoifigigh gearán moltaí a dhéanamh a chruthódh iallach athrú a dhéanamh ar shocruithe conarthacha atá ag FSS le soláthraí seirbhíse

If the CEO of the HSE or the service provider considers that a recommendation breaches this rule, they may amend the recommendation as required, or they may reject the recommendation and take other measures to deal with the complaint

Má mheasann POF FSS nó an soláthraí seirbhíse go sáraíonn moladh an riail seo, d’fhéadfaidís an moladh a leasú de réir mar is gá, nó d’fhéadfaidís an moladh a dhiúltú agus bearta eile a ghlacadh chun dul i ngleic leis an ngearán
Will details of complaints received be reported?
An ndéantar sonraí na ngearán a bhfaightear a thuairisciú?
The HSE is obliged to publish information about the complaints procedure, as part of its annual report
Tá ar FSS faisnéis a fhoilsiú faoin nós imeachta gearán, mar chuid dá tuarascáil bhliantúil
Service providers must provide the HSE with details about the number and the nature of complaints dealt with, through their own complaints procedures
Ní mór do sholáthraithe seirbhíse FSS a chur ar an eolas maidir le sonraí, líon agus cineál na ngearán a bpléadh leo, trína nósanna imeachta gearán féin
Complaints under the Disability Act 2005
Gearáin faoin Acht um Míchumas 2005
The Disability Act 2005 provides for, among other things, the assessment of need of people with disabilities and the consequent drawing up of service statements
I measc nithe eile, foráiltear leis an Acht um Míchumas 2005 do mheasúnú a dhéanamh ar riachtanais daoine faoi mhíchumas agus do ráitis seirbhíse a dhréachtú ina dhiaidh sin
There is also a complaints and appeals procedure under the Disability Act 2005 which you can use if you are unhappy with your child's assessment or service statement or delivery of related services

Tá nós imeachta gearán agus achomharc ann freisin faoin Acht um Míchumas 2005, nós imeachta is féidir leat a úsáid mura bhfuil tú sásta le measúnú ar do leanbh, le ráiteas seirbhíse do linbh nó le soláthar seirbhísí gaolmhara
There is no fee to make a formal complaint to a service provider, who provides services on behalf of the HSE. How to apply
Conas iarratas a dhéanamh
If you wish to make a complaint about the HSE you should first of all try to resolve the problem locally
Má theastaíonn uait gearán a dhéanamh faoi FSS ba cheart duit iarracht a dhéanamh an fhadhb a réiteach go háitiúil i dtús báire

That means, bringing the complaint to the attention of the person in charge of the service, for example the ward sister in the case of a hospital complaint, or the supervisor in charge for other services

Is ionann sin is a rá gur cheart an gearán a chur faoi bhráid an duine atá i gceannas ar an tseirbhís, mar shampla siúr an bharda i dtaobh gearáin ospidéil, nó an maoirseoir atá i gceannas i dtaobh seirbhísí eile
Some general advice on how to make a consumer complaint is available here
Tá roinnt comhairle ginearálta ar fáil anseo maidir leis an gcaoi chun gearán ó thomhaltóir a dhéanamh
If you are still unhappy, you can make your complaint through the formal complaints mechanism
Má tá tú fós míshásta, is féidir leat do ghearán a dhéanamh trí mheicníocht fhoirmiúil gearán
There are a number of ways in which to make a complaint to the HSE, including by mail, phone, email, online, or through advocacy or accessibility services

Tá roinnt bealaí ann chun gearán a dhéanamh chuig Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte, lena n-áirítear tríd an bpost, ar an ngutháin, trí ríomhphost, ar líne, nó trí sheirbhísí abhcóideachta nó inrochtaineachta
It is advisable to make your formal complaint in writing, giving as much detail as you can
Moltar duit gearán foirmiúil a dhéanamh i scríbhinn, agus an méid sonraí agus is féidir a thabhairt
Written complaints will be acknowledged within five working days and the complaint will be investigated within 30 days
Tabharfar admháil maidir le gach gearán scríofa laistigh de chúig lá oibre agus déanfar an gearán a fhiosrú laistigh de 30 lá
If the investigation takes longer than 30 days, the HSE will keep you up updated about progress on your complaint every 20 working days
Má mhaireann an fiosrúchán tréimhse níos faide ná 30 lá, coinneoidh FSS ar an eolas tú maidir le dul chun cinn do ghearán gach 20 lá oibre
Following the investigation, you will receive a written response to your complaint and will be advised of your right to have an internal review of the recommendation of the complaints officer
I ndiaidh an fhiosrúcháin, gheobhaidh tú freagra scríofa maidir le do ghearán agus tabharfar comhairle duit faoi do cheart go ndéanfaí athbhreithniú inmheánach ar mholadh an oifigigh ghearán
You will also be told of your right to complain to the Ombudsman
Cuirfear ar an eolas tú maidir le do cheart gearán a dhéanamh don Ombudsman fosta
What happens if you exhaust the complaints process?
Cad a tharlóidh má théann tú chomh fada agus is féidir leis an bpróiseas gearán?
If you have exhausted the health service complaints process, you may complain to the Ombudsman or the Ombudsman for Children. Their role is not changed by this complaints procedure
Má tá tú imithe chomh fada agus is féidir le próiseas gearán na seirbhíse sláinte d’fhéadfá gearán a dhéanamh leis an Ombudsman nó leis an Ombudsman do Leanaí
Actions taken by service providers under agreements with the HSE will be considered to have been taken by the HSE for the purposes of the legislation governing each Ombudsman
Measfar gur ionann gníomhartha arna ndéanamh ag soláthraithe seirbhíse faoi réir ag comhaontuithe le FSS is gníomhartha FSS chun críocha na reachtaíochta lena rialaítear gach Ombudsman
This in effect, extends the Ombudsman’s remit to these service providers
Dá réir sin, clúdaítear na soláthraithe seirbhíse seo mar chuid de shainchúram an Ombudsman
The law doesn’t provide for a mechanism for implementing the recommendations of a complaints officer or for what is to happen if the recommendation is not implemented
Níl aon mheicníocht ann sa dlí maidir le cur i bhfeidhm moltaí ó oifigeach gearán ná maidir lena dtarlaíonn mura ndéantar an moladh a chur i bhfeidhm
There is more information about the complaints procedure in Your Service, Your Say – HSE Complaints Policy
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoin nós imeachta gearán i Do Sheirbhís, Do Bharúil – Beartas Gearán FSS
The HSE’s national information line is CallSave 1850 24 1850 or (041) 685 0300
Is í uimhir Shaorghlao 1850 24 1850 nó (041) 685 0300 líne eolais náisiúnta FSS
